# <a name="replying-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="07c9d-102">Outlook.com vastamine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-102">Replying in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07c9d-103">Ühe sõnumi korraga vastamiseks tehke järgmist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-103">To reply to one message at a time:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="07c9d-104">Valige sõnumiloendis sõnum, millele soovite vastata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-104">In your message list, choose the message that you want to reply to.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="07c9d-105">Valige sõnumite paani paremas ülanurgas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-105">At the top right of the message pane, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="07c9d-106">**Vasta** või</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-106">**Reply** or</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="07c9d-107">**Vasta kõigile**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-107">**Reply all**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="07c9d-108">Tippige sõnum ja valige **saada**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-108">Type your message and then select **Send**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07c9d-109">Kõigile sõnumitele automaatselt vastamiseks tehke järgmist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-109">To automatically reply to all messages:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="07c9d-110">Mine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-110">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="07c9d-111">**Sätted**  >  **Kõigi Outlooki sätete kuvamine**  >  **Meil**  >  **Automaatsed vastused** [automaatsete vastuste sätete](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies)avamiseks.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-111">**Settings** > **View all Outlook Settings** > **Mail** > **Automatic replies** to open your [Automatic replies settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="07c9d-112">Valige lüliti **Lülita automaatvastused sisse**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-112">Select the **Turn on automatic replies** toggle.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="07c9d-113">Märkeruudu **saada vastuste saatmine ainult ajaperioodi jooksul** võimaldab teil teha järgmist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-113">Selecting the **Send replies only during a time period** check box enables you to:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="07c9d-114">Saada vastuseid ainult siis, kui valid.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-114">Only send replies when you choose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07c9d-115">Kui te ei määra ajaperioodi, jääb teie automaatne vastus alles, kuni selle välja lülitate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-115">If you don't set a time period, your automatic reply remains on until you turn it off.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="07c9d-116">Kalendri blokeerimine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-116">Block your calendar</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="07c9d-117">Uute kutsete automaatne tagasilükkamine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-117">Automatically decline new invitations</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="07c9d-118">Tühista selles ajavahemikus toimuvad koosolekud ja saada äraütlevad vastused</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-118">Decline and cancel my meetings during this period</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="07c9d-119">Väljale sõnum tippige sõnum, mille soovite saata inimestele, kes on teie äraoleku ajal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-119">In the message box, type a message to send to people during the time you're away.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="07c9d-120">Kui soovite ainult saata vastuseid oma kontaktidele, märkige ruut **saada vastused ainult kontaktidele** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-120">To only send replies to your contacts, select the **Send replies to contacts only** check box.</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="07c9d-121">Valige **Salvesta**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-121">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07c9d-122">Lugege lisateavet [Outlook.com automaatse edasisaatmise](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)kohta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07c9d-122">Learn more about [automatic forwarding in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
